title: Nicolas Kolly
content:
Nicolas Kolly (French pronunciation: [ni.kɔ.la kɔ.li]; born 13 March 1986) is a Swiss attorney and politician who serves on the National Council (Switzerland) for the Swiss People's Party since 2023.[1] He previously served on the Grand Council of Fribourg between 2011 and 2023. In 2011, Kolly was the youngest elected member aged only 25.

He is a grandson of Gabriel Kolly (1905–1974) who served on the National Council between 1960 and 1963.[2][3] Kolly did serve two years in the Swiss Armed Forces in the unit of the Pontifical Swiss Guard.[4]
